Paek Nam Sun greets Central African FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Central African Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK cabinet Hong Song Nam sent a congratulatory message to Abel Goumba upon his appointment as Prime Minister of Central Africa.
 The message wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the peace and stability of the country and the welfare of the people, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms.

Paek Nam Sun greets Central African FM 
    Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Karim Meckassoua upon his appointment as minister for foreign affairs, regional integration and Francophile counties of Central Africa.
 The message wished him success in his responsible work for achieving peace, stability and prosperity of the country, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger on good terms.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Azerbaijan
    Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Geidar Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan, on May 3 on the occasion of his 80th birthday.
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished the president great success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of the people as well as good health and happiness.

articles.content:
Congratulations to Central African President
    Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on May 5 sent a congratulatory message to Francois Bozize upon his assumption of office as president of Central Africa.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms, the message sincerely wished the president success in his responsible work for the peace, stability and democratic reconstruction of the country.
